participant_abstract.sent: All major concerns regarding the product were discussed.
Each participant actively played his/her role.
The participants seemed quite honest in giving their views.

participant_decisions.sent: The decisions made were to design remote control which looks fancy,child friendly,raised symbols,mouse like scrolls,having casing made of latex so as to make it spongy.
The chips used should be simple but advanced.
It should be operated by Rechargable batteries.

participant_problems.sent: There was a difficulty in designing the shape of the remote control.
Different participant were having different views.
Now Industrial expert has been guided to design it taking into consideration all views suggested by participants.
